author: perrotta
body:
This PR addresses a couple of issues spot by the static analyzer in the RecoParticleFlow/PFTracking package, where some bool variable was computed but never used in the code flow afterwards.

While doing so, I also cleaned a bit the touched code in the PFElecTkProducer.cc

The code should work exactly the same as before: therefore any difference in output with respect to the baseline release must be seen as a bug in this implementation.
title: Get rid of unused variables in reco particle flow pf tracking
